description:
I combined the distortion guitars that needed combining, and added the clean guitars for the 'slow chorus'.

I may have combined them incorrectly (where parts are switched between Gates and Vengeance), so I'm leaving the error reports un-resolved in case someone wants to fix them differently.

Changed the vocal instruments, not sure if it was needed but I didn't like the Clarinet sound.

Also added in the band members' names now.
title: St. James
